attributes.title: the worst app ever
attributes.review: at first glance, it looks not awful but this app gave a horrible bug on my phone and i had to wipe my phone completely. my wife crashed her car while i wipes my phone and i did not know she was in the hospital with a broken anus because of this app. my kids suffered at home while a burglar tried to steal our fridge magnets. they almost died. it was terribly set up, was very slow, and didn’t give helpful information. i will never download again. i thought about giving trump a vote but no. worst app. worst person. overall just awful. severely let down. my vote now goes to biden.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: After downloading the app, which took hours to download by the way, I signed in and scrolled for a few minutes. When I looked at my fingers, I noticed they had an orange substance on them similar to Cheeto dust. I went to wash my hands and after scrubbing for 20 MINUTES the substance did not come off fully. I accredit this to Trump’s fake orange tan. If you like having clean fingers, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: First if all, the app took almost three days ti download and in those three days, it wouldn’t let me access any other apps! After its did download, it used up all of my battery to the point where i had to charge and use. Also, after using the app, i had horrible nightmares! All I could see was a big, ugly, orange thing. Don’t download!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP😤😤
attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app, everything was fine. But then, I opened it this morning and a bunch of oranges started falling from my ceiling. They kept hitting me in the head and I got knocked out. One of the oranges exploded and the juice went in my eyes. Then, a guy with a box came to my door. It was for me! I opened the box, and A BUNCH OF ORANGES START FLYING AT MY FACE! This is UNACCEPTABLE AND DISGUSTING TREATMENT, don’t make the same mistake and download it

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible don’t get
attributes.review: So I got the app to support the cheeto puff but then it took weeks so download and made my phone so slow. Then when it finally downloaded I turned orange just like the president Cheeto puff anyways the app is just absolutely horrible and I can’t stand being orange so I deleted the app and went back to my normal skin. In conclusion the app is terrible.

attributes.title: This app gives AIDS!!!
attributes.review: This is so upsetting 💔💔 I GOT AIDS! It all started when i signed up and i put in my number! and next thing i know THIS {🟠} IS TEXTING ME FOR HEAD🤕🤕 I was down tho 😼 So i proceeded to give {🟠} my addy 😩😫 NEXT THING I KNOW {🟠} pulled up and gave me AIDS! terrible service didn’t even know any nicki minaj song 😿😿. I also got really bags diarrhea from this app 🕊🤕👄😫✋🏼💩 CHORRO. CULO CAGADO!!! DONT- GET- THIS- APP. on that note take it OFF ❌ the apple store 🚫 🧢😁😁

attributes.title: DONT GET APP! IT SENDS VIRUSES TO YOUR PHONE AND SEND JUNK EMAILS!!! ⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.review: This is the WORST app ever! I was excited to get it to find out about rally’s and news HOWEVER every single time I would log on my phone would CRASH! So I took my phone to my Verizon store to find out what was wrong and they send that the app was causing virus and it was also the reason for the spam emails that I was getting... VERY BAD APP! 0 out of 5 stars😪

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: I was doing my thing until the app started glitching my phone, the amount of power in the app made my phone really laggy, eventually it became so slow to the point it took FOREVER to delete the app. I finally deleted it and I came back to right a review. Disgusting, never wanna see someone download this app EVER again. I expect this app to be deleted.

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the fuss was about! And all it consisted of was unsightly images of a wrinkled orange! It’s was terrible!! They showed him doing all sorts of things! They even had his nudes on there! (Talk about a garlic knot) I’ve been severely scarred by this and don’t think I’ll be able to recover from this. This app is  Full of delirious imagery and writings. Have this taken down!

attributes.title: Unsatisfied
attributes.review: Terrible app. Right after it downloaded. It asked me for my phone number and started sending me spam messages on my phone. It got so annoying that I had to silence my phone. The messages still kept coming, so I went back into the app to unsubscribe, but it kept glitching out. So I deleted this app and restarted my phone.
